original_title: 映像作品集13巻 ~Tour 2016-2017「20th Anniversary Live」at 日本武道館~
overview: Recording of the Nippon Budokan concert from the popular rock band ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION's 20th anniversary tour. Includes "Haruka Kanata", "Senseless", "Sayonara Lost Generation," and 32 other songs.
title: Eizo Sakuhin Volume 13 ~Tour 2016-2017 20th Anniversary Live at Nippon Budokan~
